description:
Reform UK leader Nigel Farage is at odds with his own constituents over the issue of climate change, according to new polling.  A majority (68 percent) of voters in Clacton, Essex, are concerned about the effects of rising temperatures, according to a poll by More in Common, and the think tank E3G.  Clacton voters are […]

The post Two-Thirds of People in Climate Denier Nigel Farage’s Constituency Are Worried About Rising Temperatures appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Two-Thirds of People in Climate Denier Nigel Farage’s Constituency Are Worried About Rising Temperatures
